column3: “Great strand for me in pain management and ADHD control”

“I picked this up at Altitude Organic Medicine in Colorado Springs. The aroma is earthy, becoming pleasently sweet and floral when ground up.  Impressively smooth on the intake and friendly on the bronchials. One can easily take gnarly bong rips like a champ with this strain. I have to say this is some of the best am weed I've come across in a while. It's a little less racy than the G.C. but still clean and clear head...”

“This high felt so different from all the other highs I've experienced. It tastes great and it made me beyond relaxed I felt like I was on a cloud. I normally have a really high tolerance with weed but this strain got me high as fuck on the first hit; Highly recommended!”

“Purples consistently give the best mood elevation and it holds true here with a really fun come on. Brightens and clears out the head wonderfully. Opposite of a cloudy / stupefying high. Top marks for mood elevation - it really lifts spirits with strong euphoria. Makes socializing easy and fun. There is a slight raciness in the background. A rare combo of a solid feel-good high with clear-mindedness.”
“Yeah was dope its a rare one👌 I rarely have smoked them😧🔥🌴💨”

“Very euphoric and bouncy. Makes me very talkative. Completely destroys anxiety and depression. Medium green buds with purple spots covered in crystal. The taste is a sweet, grape or fig like berry taste. Thick and easy smoke. Definitely a new favorite of mine. On a side note, from what I've noticed it also serves as a fun and energetic aphrodisiac.”
“Looks better than it actually is, not the best but got me feeling a little wavyy”

“It takes a minute to kick in but when it does your on your ass. It's a great body high, so you can actually function and be focused. It's also great to just sit and relax b before bed too.  it's a wonderful strain and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.”

“It takes a minute to kick in but when it does your on your ass. It's a great body high, so you can actually function and be focused. It's also great to just sit and relax b before bed too.  it's a wonderful strain and I would definitely recommend it to anyone.”
“Love this strain to make the work day extra fun.   Uplifting, smile inducing.   I'd buy it again for the euphoria alone.”

“Fantastic strain! I was having a bad day with my depression and bought this strain and made me feel amazing and better about my life made me realize the better things in life also just very relaxing”

“Under the care of the right grower this bud comes out to be a beautiful light green with allot of crystals, it has a very pungent smell that is almost sweet and the taste is very smooth and mouth watering though i cant pin point the flavors but definitely a Top Shelf Strain.”

“this is a great strain to smoke either during the day or even before bed,smoke a joint full of it last night before bed and took away the chronic pain I suffer and the pressure migraines that I get!!I highly recommend this to anyone who has not tried it.”

“Purple Crack was very relaxing through my whole body, then I began to feel a bit sleepy.  Extremely strong chronic pain relief, my mood was uplifted and definitely made me happier. Will give you the munchies closer to the end of the buzz.”
“I picked up an 8th of this from my dispensary and if give it a 3.3, it made me dazed and I want thinking straight.  it wasn't like the regular I can't think straight"
column4: it felt more like constant confusion. I'm not saying I wouldn't smoke it again

column3: “The service was awesome and the delivery I swear was only a 10 min wait haha. Gave me so much choice I was very happy. Will definitely be calling these guys again.”
“the storm troopers are comming for us mon”
“The service was awesome and the delivery I swear was only a 10 min wait haha. Gave me so much choice I was very happy. Will definitely be calling these guys again.”

“Tastes really good, the smoke isn't harsh at all. Trippy as fuck, has the focusing effects of a Sativa and the relaxing buzz of an Indica. I like to do smoke this when I've had a stressful day and I still have to get some work done. Downside is it gives you dry mouth and slight paranoia.”
“Top tier bud. Took me a while to find but great for sleep and pain”
“Gotten while in ME. Not as bad as I thought anxiety wise. There's actually not much negative about it”
“Good pungent strain. I have adhd and it put me to sleep. Tastes uncannily like snowmobile exhaust. 8/10”
“Helps relax while still retaining focus!”
“It was very smooth and a cool feeling! Uplifting and happy! And high AF.”
“great high for socializing. I would prefer to smoke this with others.”
“Oh my god ! The taste and smell is perfect❤️ can't wait to have a great 4th🇺🇸”
“great deep purple bud”
“loved it great flavor and amazing head buzz puts a smile on yiur face every time”
“Fantastic strain for the price, great for day-to-day maintenance. Heady high, not much couch-lock to note.”
“Love this strain only the second time I've smoked it but def worth the wait”

“Had a nug run extract of purple crack and I will say this was definitely one of my favorites.  The citrus pine taste was dominant and the high was very enjoyable. This strain is a good fit for smoking all day, and lead me to have a very enjoyable day off work.”
“great for insomnia. smoke this and you sleep like a baby 1h later”

“This wax tasted and smelled better than any wax I've had before. To me wax tastes like dirt but this tasted like a lemon and it sent me sky high. Chilled me out but I was super giddy too.
It was dark purple and brittle as hell. I would definitely buy it again.”
“I'm not the biggest fan of earthy buds but it's pretty good.”
“Perfect daytime strain for me.  Treats my PTSD and pain very well. It is hard to treat pain with a Sativa but this one works great with no down side side effects.”
“I got a dealer that always has it's a beauty bud”
“Had the sativa dominant version to it. It’s a pretty controlled sativa. Perfect layer back sativa in my opinion.”
“It was very smooth and a cool feeling! Uplifting and happy! And high AF.”
“No i was not focus at all poor descriptions 👎🏿👎🏿👎🏿”
“I thought it would make me energetic but I keep falling asleep on it lol”
“Helps relax while still retaining focus!”
“Gotten while in ME. Not as bad as I thought anxiety wise. There's actually not much negative about it”
“Top tier bud. Took me a while to find but great for sleep and pain”
“makes good jays”
“Great smoke, great smell. Good daytime smoke. Mild smooth flavor, not overpowering.”
“Good pungent strain. I have adhd and it put me to sleep. Tastes uncannily like snowmobile exhaust. 8/10”
“Very calming and a great destresser to end a day with.”

“Not at all what I was expecting, which is a good thing. I was expecting a racy, heart pounding sativa, but the effects were quite relaxing. The smell is a mix of familiar dank aroma and a peppery spice. The taste is very peppery, which turned me off. Overall it's a decent strain, but not one that I'm interested in buying again.”

“This strain is definitely in my top 10. Such a great taste, but the buds are also just beautiful! Big fluffy nugs! The high left me nice and energetic but also had me max relaxin. Purely an awesome strain!”
“The best for anxiety.”
“For me zero anxiety or paranoia. Awake and alert with a happy relaxed feeling. Helps with all of my symptoms. Kind of like green crack with more of a mellow feel.”
“Chill, smooth and mellow! I think this will be at the top of my list.”
“Awesome strain. Pretty appearance, Deep purple definitely stands out. Very frosty. Wonderful aroma. Provides the perfect high!”
“The strain is really good don't really have bad effect.Good for party and fun.”
“I love this strain one of my favorites & plus I love the way it smells”
“I love this strain. It's relaxing, calming and one stain to use your imagination. It also doesn't taste bad at all.”

“I picked up the MOST AMAZING batch. SO purple SO dense SO many clear crystals. More of a sativa high, very weak actually. It just looked amazing, and it only smelled ok not like green crack.  Mine was tested at 26.9%thc and 27.1%total cannabinoids.”

“Well for me when I tried it I thought I would be super high but I wasn't,I was more relaxed and awake then anything. I gotta get some more of this,plus I would mix it with some Reggz and Sour Diesel, what I always call making a salad. My salads were  ounces of Reggz/Purple Haze/Chocolate Thai/Hydro Ponic/White Haze/Crippy/Jamaican Reggz, and if you want to add some more to make it more stronger you can go ahead and d...”
“Holy shit, i love it. Great high. Top shelf medicine”

“waaaay too heady for me
I prefer my Indica strains”
